020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_BOOLEAN;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_BYTE;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_CHAR;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_DOUBLE;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_FLOAT;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_INT;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_LONG;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_SHORT;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_VOID;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
038
039import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
040import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
041import javax.lang.model.element.TypeParameterElement;
042import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
043import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
044import javax.lang.model.type.ErrorType;
045import javax.lang.model.type.NoType;
046import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
047import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
048import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
049import javax.lang.model.util.SimpleTypeVisitor14;
050import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
051import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
052import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
053import java.lang.reflect.Type;
054import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
055import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
056import java.util.ArrayList;
057import java.util.Collection;
058import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
059import java.util.List;
060import java.util.Map;
061import java.util.Optional;
062
063import org.apiguardian.api.API;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
071import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
072
073/**
074 *  The implementation of
075 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
076 *  as representation of any type in Java's type system, plus {@code void}.
077 *
078 *  @author Square,Inc.
079 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
080 *  @version $Id: TypeNameImpl.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $
081 *  @since 0.0.5
082 *
083 *  @UMLGraph.link
084 */
085@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyFields" )
086@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeNameImpl.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $" )
087@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
088public sealed class TypeNameImpl implements TypeName
089    permits ArrayTypeNameImpl, ClassNameImpl, ParameterizedTypeNameImpl, TypeVariableNameImpl, WildcardTypeNameImpl
090{
091        /*-----------*\
092    ====** Constants **========================================================
093        \*-----------*/
094    /**
095     *  The type name for {@code boolean}.
096     */
097    public static final TypeNameImpl BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "boolean" );
098
099    /**
100     *  The type name for {@code byte}.
101     */
102    public static final TypeNameImpl BYTE_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "byte" );
103
104    /**
105     *  The type name for {@code char}.
106     */
107    public static final TypeNameImpl CHAR_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "char" );
108
109    /**
110     *  The type name for {@code double}.
111     */
112    public static final TypeNameImpl DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "double" );
113
114    /**
115     *  The type name for {@code float}.
116     */
117    public static final TypeNameImpl FLOAT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "float" );
118
119    /**
120     *  The type name for {@code int}.
121     */
122    public static final TypeNameImpl INT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "int" );
123
124    /**
125     *  The type name for {@code long}.
126     */
127    public static final TypeNameImpl LONG_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "long" );
128
129    /**
130     *  The type name for {@code short}.
131     */
132    public static final TypeNameImpl SHORT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "short" );
133
134    /**
135     *  The type name for {@code void}.
136     */
137    public static final TypeNameImpl VOID_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "void" );
138
139        /*------------*\
140    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
141        \*------------*/
142    /**
143     *  The annotations for this type.
144     */
145    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
146
147    /**
148     *  Lazily initialised return value of
149     *  {@link #toString()}
150     *  of this type name.
151     */
152    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
153
154    /**
155     *  The name of this type if it is a keyword.
156     */
157    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
158    private final Optional<String> m_Keyword;
159
160        /*--------------*\
161    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
162        \*--------------*/
163    /**
164     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
165     *
166     *  @param  keyword The name of this type if it is a keyword, {@code null}
167     *      otherwise.
168     */
169    public TypeNameImpl( final String keyword ) { this( keyword, List.of() ); }
170
171    /**
172     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
173     *
174     *  @param  keyword The name of this type if it is a keyword, {@code null}
175     *      otherwise.
176     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this type name.
177     */
178    public TypeNameImpl( final String keyword, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
179    {
180        m_Keyword = Optional.ofNullable( keyword );
181        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ) );
182
183        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initialiseCachedString );
184    }   //  TypeNameImpl()
185
186    /**
187     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
188     *
189     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this type name.
190     */
191    public TypeNameImpl( final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations ) { this( null, annotations ); }
192
193        /*---------*\
194    ====** Methods **==========================================================
195        \*---------*/
196    /**
197     *  {@inheritDoc}
198     */
199    @Override
200    public TypeNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
201    {
202        final var combined = concatAnnotations( requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ) );
203        final var retValue = new TypeNameImpl( m_Keyword.orElse( null ), combined );
204
205        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
206        return retValue;
207    }   //  annotated()
208
209    /**
210     *  Returns the annotations for this type name.
211     *
212     *  @return The annotations.
213     */
214    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
215    public final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations() { return m_Annotations; }
216
217    /**
218     *  Returns the given type name as an array; the return value is empty if
219     *  it is not an array.
220     *
221     *  @param  type    The type name.
222     *  @return An instance of
223     *      {@link Optional}
224     *      that holds the array type name.
225     */
226    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
227    public static final Optional<ArrayTypeNameImpl> asArray( final TypeName type )
228    {
229        final Optional<ArrayTypeNameImpl> retValue = type instanceof final ArrayTypeNameImpl arrayType
230            ? Optional.of( arrayType )
231            : Optional.empty();
232
233        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
234        return retValue;
235    }   //  asArray()
236
237    /**
238     *  {@inheritDoc}
239     */
240    @SuppressWarnings( {"MethodWithMultipleReturnPoints", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
241    @Override
242    public final TypeNameImpl box()
243    {
244        if( m_Keyword.isEmpty() ) return this; // Doesn't need boxing.
245        if( this == VOID_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_VOID;
246        if( this == BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_BOOLEAN;
247        if( this == BYTE_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_BYTE;
248        if( this == SHORT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_SHORT;
249        if( this == INT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_INT;
250        if( this == LONG_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_LONG;
251        if( this == CHAR_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_CHAR;
252        if( this == FLOAT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_FLOAT;
253        if( this == DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_DOUBLE;
254
255        //---* Something went awfully wrong ... *------------------------------
256        throw new AssertionError( m_Keyword.get() );
257    }   //  box()
258
259    /**
260     *  Combines the annotations of this instance with the given ones.
261     *
262     *  @param  annotations The annotations to add.
263     *  @return The combined list of annotations.
264     */
265    protected final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> concatAnnotations( final Collection<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
266    {
267        final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> list = new ArrayList<>( m_Annotations );
268        annotations.stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a ).forEach( list::add );
269        final var retValue = List.copyOf( list );
270
271        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
272        return retValue;
273    }   //  concatAnnotations()
274
275    /**
276     *  Emits this type name instance to the given
277     *  {@link CodeWriter}.
278     *
279     *  @param  out The code writer.
280     *  @return The code writer.
281     *  @throws UncheckedIOException Something went wrong when emitting to the
282     *      output target.
283     */
284    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
285    public CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
286    {
287        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
288        if( m_Keyword.isEmpty() ) throw new AssertionError();
289
290        if( isAnnotated() )
291        {
292            retValue = retValue.emit( "" );
293            retValue = emitAnnotations( retValue );
294        }
295        retValue = retValue.emitAndIndent( m_Keyword.get() );
296
297        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
298        return retValue;
299    }   //  emit()
300
301    /**
302     *  Emits the annotation from this type name instance to the given
303     *  {@link CodeWriter}.
304     *
305     *  @param  out The code writer.
306     *  @return The code writer.
307     *  @throws UncheckedIOException Something went wrong when emitting to the
308     *      output target.
309     */
310    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
311    protected final CodeWriter emitAnnotations( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
312    {
313        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
314        for( final var annotation : m_Annotations )
315        {
316            annotation.emit( retValue, true );
317            retValue = retValue.emit( " " );
318        }
319
320        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
321        return retValue;
322    }   //  emitAnnotations()
323
324    /**
325     *  {@inheritDoc}
326     */
327    @Override
328    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
329    {
330        var retValue = this == o;
331        if( !retValue && o instanceof TypeNameImpl )
332        {
333            retValue = (getClass() == o.getClass()) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
334        }
335
336        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
337        return retValue;
338    }   //  equals()
339
340    /**
341     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
342     *  {@link TypeMirror}
343     *  instance.
344     *
345     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
346     *  @return The respective type name.
347     */
348    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
349    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final TypeMirror mirror )
350    {
351        final var retValue = from( requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ), Map.of() );
352
353        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
354        return retValue;
355    }   //  get()
356
357    /**
358     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
359     *  {@link Type}
360     *  instance.
361     *
362     *  @param  type    The type.
363     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
364     */
365    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
366    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final Type type )
367    {
368        final var retValue = from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ), Map.of() );
369
370        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
371        return retValue;
372    }   //  from()
373
374    /**
375     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
376     *  {@link TypeMirror}
377     *  instance.
378     *
379     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
380     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
381     *
382     *  @return The respective type name.
383     */
384    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.2.0" )
385    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final TypeMirror mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
386    {
387        @SuppressWarnings( {"AnonymousInnerClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyComplexAnonymousInnerClass", "AnonymousInnerClass"} )
388        final var retValue = mirror.accept( new SimpleTypeVisitor14<TypeNameImpl,Void>()
389        {
390            /**
391             *  {@inheritDoc}
392             */
393            @Override
394            public final TypeNameImpl visitPrimitive( final PrimitiveType t, final Void p )
395            {
396                return switch( t.getKind() )
397                {
398                    case BOOLEAN -> BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
399                    case BYTE -> BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
400                    case SHORT -> SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
401                    case INT -> INT_PRIMITIVE;
402                    case LONG -> LONG_PRIMITIVE;
403                    case CHAR -> CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
404                    case FLOAT -> FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
405                    case DOUBLE -> DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
406                    //$CASES-OMITTED$
407                    default -> throw new AssertionError();
408                };
409            }   //  visitPrimitive()
410
411            /**
412             *  {@inheritDoc}
413             */
414            @Override
415            public final TypeNameImpl visitDeclared( final DeclaredType t, final Void p )
416            {
417                final var rawType = ClassNameImpl.from( (TypeElement) t.asElement() );
418                final var enclosingType = t.getEnclosingType();
419                final var enclosing = (enclosingType.getKind() != TypeKind.NONE) && !t.asElement().getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) ? enclosingType.accept( this, null ) : null;
420                @SuppressWarnings( "AnonymousClassVariableHidesContainingMethodVariable" )
421                final TypeNameImpl retValue;
422                if( t.getTypeArguments().isEmpty() && ! (enclosing instanceof ParameterizedTypeName) )
423                {
424                    retValue = rawType;
425                }
426                else
427                {
428                    final var typeArgumentNames = t.getTypeArguments()
429                        .stream()
430                        .map( typeMirror -> from( typeMirror, typeVariables ) )
431                        .collect( toList() );
432                    //noinspection CastConflictsWithInstanceof
433                    retValue = enclosing instanceof ParameterizedTypeName
434                        ? ((ParameterizedTypeNameImpl) enclosing)
435                            .nestedClass( rawType.simpleName(), typeArgumentNames.stream().map( typeName -> (TypeName) typeName ).collect( toList() ) )
436                        : new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, rawType, typeArgumentNames );
437                }
438
439                //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
440                return retValue;
441            }   //  visitDeclared()
442
443            /**
444             *  {@inheritDoc}
445             */
446            @Override
447            public final TypeNameImpl visitError( final ErrorType t, final Void p ) { return visitDeclared( t, p ); }
448
449            /**
450             *  {@inheritDoc}
451             */
452            @Override
453            public final ArrayTypeNameImpl visitArray( final ArrayType t, final Void p ) { return ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
454
455            /**
456             *  {@inheritDoc}
457             */
458            @Override
459            public final TypeNameImpl visitTypeVariable( final javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable t, final Void p ) { return TypeVariableNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
460
461            /**
462             *  {@inheritDoc}
463             */
464            @Override
465            public final TypeNameImpl visitWildcard( final javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType t, final Void p ) { return WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
466
467            /**
468             *  {@inheritDoc}
469             */
470            @Override
471            public final TypeNameImpl visitNoType( final NoType t, final Void p )
472            {
473                @SuppressWarnings( "AnonymousClassVariableHidesContainingMethodVariable" )
474                final var retValue = t.getKind() == TypeKind.VOID
475                    ? VOID_PRIMITIVE
476                    : visitUnknown( t, p );
477
478                //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
479                return retValue;
480            }   //  visitNoType()
481
482            /**
483             *  {@inheritDoc}
484             */
485            @Override
486            protected final TypeNameImpl defaultAction( final TypeMirror e, final Void p )
487            {
488                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Unexpected type mirror: " + e );
489            }
490        }, null );
491
492        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
493        return retValue;
494    }   //  from()
495
496    /**
497     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
498     *  {@link Type}
499     *  instance.
500     *
501     *  @param  type    The type.
502     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
503     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
504     */
505    @SuppressWarnings( {"IfStatementWithTooManyBranches", "ChainOfInstanceofChecks", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
506    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.2.0" )
507    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final Type type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
508    {
509        final var retValue = switch( type )
510        {
511            case final Class<?> aClass -> {
512                if( aClass == void.class ) yield VOID_PRIMITIVE;
513                else if( aClass == boolean.class ) yield BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
514                else if( aClass == byte.class ) yield BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
515                else if( aClass == short.class ) yield SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
516                else if( aClass == int.class ) yield INT_PRIMITIVE;
517                else if( aClass == long.class ) yield LONG_PRIMITIVE;
518                else if( aClass == char.class ) yield CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
519                else if( aClass == float.class ) yield FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
520                else if( aClass == double.class ) yield DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
521                else if( aClass == Object.class ) yield OBJECT;
522                else if( aClass.isArray() ) yield ArrayTypeNameImpl.of( from( aClass.getComponentType(), typeVariables ) );
523                else yield ClassNameImpl.from( aClass );
524            }
525            case final ParameterizedType parameterizedType -> ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.from( parameterizedType, typeVariables );
526            case final WildcardType wildcardType -> WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( wildcardType, typeVariables );
527            case final TypeVariable<?> typeVariable -> TypeVariableNameImpl.from( typeVariable, typeVariables );
528            case final GenericArrayType genericArrayType -> ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( genericArrayType, typeVariables );
529            case null -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "type is null" );
530            default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "unexpected type: " + type );
531        };
532
533        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
534        return retValue;
535    }   //  from()
536
537    /**
538     *  {@inheritDoc}
539     */
540    @Override
541    public final int hashCode() { return toString().hashCode(); }
542
543    /**
544     *  The initializer for
545     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
546     *
547     *  @return The return value for
548     *      {@link #toString()}.
549     */
550    private final String initialiseCachedString()
551    {
552        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
553        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( new JavaComposer(), resultBuilder );
554        try
555        {
556            emit( codeWriter );
557        }
558        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
559        {
560            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
561        }
562        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
563
564        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
565        return retValue;
566    }   //  initialiseCachedString()
567
568    /**
569     *  {@inheritDoc}
570     */
571    @Override
572    public boolean isAnnotated() { return !m_Annotations.isEmpty(); }
573
574    /**
575     *  {@inheritDoc}
576     */
577    @SuppressWarnings( "SuspiciousMethodCalls" )
578    @Override
579    public final boolean isBoxedPrimitive()
580    {
581        final var retValue = List.of( BOXED_BOOLEAN, BOXED_BYTE, BOXED_SHORT, BOXED_INT, BOXED_LONG, BOXED_CHAR, BOXED_FLOAT, BOXED_DOUBLE )
582            .contains( this );
583
584        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
585        return retValue;
586    }   //  isBoxedPrimitive()
587
588    /**
589     *  {@inheritDoc}
590     */
591    @Override
592    public final boolean isPrimitive()
593    {
594        final var retValue = m_Keyword.isPresent() && (this != VOID_PRIMITIVE);
595
596        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
597        return retValue;
598    }   //  isPrimitive()
599
600    /**
601     *  Converts an array of types to a list of type names.
602     *
603     *  @param  types   The types.
604     *  @return The type names.
605     */
606    public static final List<TypeNameImpl> list( final Type... types ) { return list( types, new LinkedHashMap<>() ); }
607
608    /**
609     *  Converts an array of types to a list of type names.
610     *
611     *  @param  types   The types.
612     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
613     *  @return The type names.
614     */
615    public static final List<TypeNameImpl> list( final Type [] types, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
616    {
617        requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" );
618        final var retValue = stream( requireNonNullArgument( types, "types" ) )
619            .map( t -> from( t, typeVariables ) )
620            .collect( toList() );
621
622        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
623        return retValue;
624    }   //  list()
625
626    /**
627     *  {@inheritDoc}
628     */
629    @Override
630    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
631
632    /**
633     *  {@inheritDoc}
634     */
635    @SuppressWarnings( {"MethodWithMultipleReturnPoints", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
636    @Override
637    public final TypeNameImpl unbox()
638    {
639        if( m_Keyword.isPresent() ) return this; // Already unboxed.
640        if( equals( BOXED_VOID ) ) return VOID_PRIMITIVE;
641        if( equals( BOXED_BOOLEAN ) ) return BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
642        if( equals( BOXED_BYTE ) ) return BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
643        if( equals( BOXED_SHORT ) ) return SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
644        if( equals( BOXED_INT ) ) return INT_PRIMITIVE;
645        if( equals( BOXED_LONG ) ) return LONG_PRIMITIVE;
646        if( equals( BOXED_CHAR ) ) return CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
647        if( equals( BOXED_FLOAT ) ) return FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
648        if( equals( BOXED_DOUBLE ) ) return DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
649        throw new UnsupportedOperationException( "cannot unbox " + this );
650    }   //  unbox()
651
652    /**
653     *  {@inheritDoc}
654     */
655    @Override
656    public TypeNameImpl withoutAnnotations() { return new TypeNameImpl( m_Keyword.orElse( null ) ); }
657}
658//  class TypeNameImpl
659
660/*
661 *  End of File
662 */
